member.name: T:JobProcess.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:JobProcess.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:JobProcess.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:JobProcess.ConnectToNetworkFunctions
member.summary: Several functions to connect to a network (with username and password) an copy a file on there. Note that you have to choose a network-drive-letter (e.g.: X:)
member.remarks: It's just a little bit of code, there are no error handlers. A CMD is needed. Maybe later I'll build up this dll.

member.name: M:JobProcess.ConnectToNetworkFunctions.connectToNetwork(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Connects the system to a network drive and waits until the system is connected
member.returns: True if connection establisht, otherwise false

member.name: M:JobProcess.ConnectToNetworkFunctions.connectToNetwork(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Connects the system to a network drive and waits until the system is connected
member.returns: True if connection establisht, otherwise false

member.name: M:JobProcess.ConnectToNetworkFunctions.disconnectFromNetwork(System.String)
member.summary: Disconnects the system from a network drive, that was initialited before by connectToNetwork
member.returns: True if connection closed, otherwise false

member.name: M:JobProcess.ConnectToNetworkFunctions.copyFileToSecurityNetworkShare(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copy a file onto a remote share with password security. All parameters are needed! After the copy is done, the connection will be disconnected
member.param: Path to the source file you want to copy (e.g.: "C:\Temp\Testfile.doc")
